msTools.tools.menu

  • setup

msTools
  • Docs »

setup¶

Data¶

str TOOL_NAMESPACE

str TOOL_NAME

Functions¶

def install()

def uninstall()

Description¶

Manage installation of the msTools Menu within the current Maya session.

The msTools Menu provides quick access to various tools and operations relating to the msTools package.

The msTools.tools.tool_manager can be used to retrieve existing msTool Menus using the TOOL_NAMESPACE and TOOL_NAME.

msTools.tools.menu.setup.TOOL_NAMESPACE = 'MRS'¶

The tool namespace used to register a msTools Menu with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Type:str
msTools.tools.menu.setup.TOOL_NAME = 'msTools Menu'¶

The tool name used to register a msTools Menu with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Type:str
msTools.tools.menu.setup.install(force=False)¶

Install the msTools Menu to the menu-bar of the Maya main window.

The tool will be registered with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Parameters:force (bool) – Whether to force the installation by removing any existing msTools Menu from the menu-bar. If False, an existing msTools Menu widget will be returned if one already exists under the menu-bar. Defaults to False - return any existing instance.
Returns:PySide2.QtWidgets.QMenu – The msTools Menu widget.
msTools.tools.menu.setup.uninstall(tool)¶

Uninstall a given msTools Menu.

The tool will be deregistered from the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Parameters:tool (PySide2.QtWidgets.QMenu) – An msTools Menu widget to uninstall.
